column5: so um..i'm going pike fishing tmro and i only got half a day tmro and i'm having trouble deciding whether if i should go in the morning or afternoon  thanks for the help =D hope everyone have a good long  weekend
Based on the last two weeks, I'd say mid-morning to mid-afternoon.
Like all fish. The best time is when they are hungry.
Pike hold banker's hours. Go after 10AM.
We got ours today between 10 and noon!  They turned off after that.  Joey
you guys...and gals make it to easy....
Afternoon although I'll be going at 8am with a buddy & his wife she wants to beat the heat but I might be there til 6 or 8pm with my nephews Richard
I got 2 fish today. One at 12:30, the other at 3:30...it's a toss up but I never got to fish earlier than 12:15 or no later than 4pm lol
Depends on the body of water I guess. I've always had better luck in the morning.  Where are you fishing?
i fished mountsberg saturday from 7am to 1pm with my soninlaw  we cought 50 pike  it was a good day
